channel.title: Comments on: Twitter Salt Lake City Data Center

item.title: By: Levi Pearson
item.dc:creator: Levi Pearson
item.description: I used to work in that building. It's the former home of Linux Networx, which developed supercomputing clusters. It's a great location for a datacenter since Linux Networx already had the power and air conditioning infrastructure for running huge high-end server clusters at high load. It's good to see the vacancy there finally filled, and hopefully it will bring some good tech jobs here too.
item.content:encoded: I used to work in that building. It’s the former home of Linux Networx, which developed supercomputing clusters. It’s a great location for a datacenter since Linux Networx already had the power and air conditioning infrastructure for running huge high-end server clusters at high load. It’s good to see the vacancy there finally filled, and hopefully it will bring some good tech jobs here too.

item.title: By: Sources Confirm Location of Twitter’s Utah Data Center | Stay N' Alive
